# Introduccion

# Paquetes

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(rstatix)
library(ggpubr)

```

# Datos

```{r}
mental <- read_csv("../Data/limpiar/DAT SALUD MENTAL - ATENDIDOS.csv",
                   locale = locale(encoding = "ISO-8859-1"),
                   col_names = TRUE,
                   col_types = NULL)
mental
```

# EDA

```{r}
mental %>% 
  separate(Etapa_1, c("Etapa_A", "Etapa_B")) %>% 
  mutate(
    Etapa_A = case_when(
      Etapa_A == "ene" ~ "01",
      Etapa_A == "feb" ~ "02",
      Etapa_A == "mar" ~ "03",
      Etapa_A == "abr" ~ "04",
      Etapa_A == "may" ~ "05",
      Etapa_A == "jun" ~ "06",
      Etapa_A == "jul" ~ "07",
      Etapa_A == "ago" ~ "08",
      Etapa_A == "sep" ~ "09",
      Etapa_A == "oct" ~ "10",
      Etapa_A == "nov" ~ "11",
      Etapa_A == "dic" ~ "12",
     TRUE ~ as.character(Etapa_A)),
    Etapa_B = case_when(
      Etapa_B == "ene" ~ "01",
      Etapa_B == "feb" ~ "02",
      Etapa_B == "mar" ~ "03",
      Etapa_B == "abr" ~ "04",
      Etapa_B == "may" ~ "05",
      Etapa_B == "jun" ~ "06",
      Etapa_B == "jul" ~ "07",
      Etapa_B == "ago" ~ "08",
      Etapa_B == "sep" ~ "09",
      Etapa_B == "oct" ~ "10",
      Etapa_B == "nov" ~ "11",
      Etapa_B == "dic" ~ "12",
      TRUE ~ as.character(Etapa_B)),
    Etapa_A = as.numeric(Etapa_A),
    Etapa_B = as.numeric(Etapa_B))
```

## Total de atenciones por Departamento

```{r}
mental %>% 
  group_by(Departamento) %>% 
  summarise(Conteo = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(Conteo))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = mental %>% 
         group_by(Departamento) %>% 
         summarise(conteo = n())) +
  geom_col(mapping = aes(x = Departamento, y = conteo, fill = Departamento)) +
  coord_flip()
```

# Total de atenciones por Mes

```{r}
mental %>% 
  group_by(NroMes) %>% 
  summarise(count = n()) %>% 
  print(n = Inf)
```

# Grafico NÂ°2

```{r}
ggplot(mental, aes(x = NroMes, fill = as.factor(NroMes)))+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1:9)+
  geom_bar()+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  labs(y = "Conteo")
```

# Total de diagnosticos

```{r}
mental %>% 
  group_by(Diagnostico) %>% 
  summarise(count = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(count)) %>% 
  print(n = Inf)
```

# Grafico 3

```{r}
ggplot(mental, aes(x = Diagnostico, y = count()))+
  geom_bar()
```

# Diagnosticos por Atenciones

```{r}
mental %>% 
  group_by(Diagnostico, Atenciones) %>% 
  summarise(count = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(count)) %>% 
  print(n = Inf)
```
